metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24565 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Checkmk <=2.0.0p19 Fixed in 2.0.0p20 and Checkmk <=1.6.0p27 Fixed in1.6.0p28 are affected by a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. TheAlias of a site was not properly escaped when shown as condition fornotifications.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24565` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

check-mk-agent - 1.2.8p16-1ubuntu0.2
check-mk-agent-logwatch - 1.2.8p16-1ubuntu0.2
check-mk-config-icinga - 1.2.8p16-1ubuntu0.2
check-mk-livestatus - 1.2.8p16-1ubuntu0.2
check-mk-multisite - 1.2.8p16-1ubuntu0.2
check-mk-server - 1.2.8p16-1ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: check-mk package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.8p16-1ubuntu0.2').
